alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Zion National Park (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 05 at 5:53PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT WESTERN GARFIELD...NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON...NORTHWESTERN KANE AND EASTERN IRON COUNTIES... At 549 PM MST...an area of moderate to heavy snow extended across much of southwest Utah. This snow will continue through 8 PM, resulting in slushy to snow covered roadways across the area, including I-15 from Beaver to Cedar City. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 33 and 100. US Route 89 between mile markers 85 and 155. Utah Route 12 between mile markers 0 and 21. Utah Route 56 between mile markers 38 and 61. * visibilities will drop to less than a quarter mile at times in this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour can be expected in this area of heavy snow. Slushy to snow covered roads and greatly reduced visibility can be expected across all area roadways through 8 PM.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; Lower Washington County; South Central Utah; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Upper Sevier River Valleys; Zion National Park
